lead_paragraph: Chief Justice Moore was suspended for the remainder of his term for ordering Alabama’s probate judges to defy federal court orders on same-sex marriage licenses.

headline.print_headline: Chief Justice in Alabama Is Suspended a Second Time
headline.main: Roy Moore, Alabama Chief Justice, Suspended Over Gay Marriage Order

snippet: Chief Justice Moore was suspended for the remainder of his term for ordering Alabama’s probate judges to defy federal court orders on same-sex marriage licenses....
abstract: Alabama Court of Judiciary suspends state Supreme Court Chief Justice Roy S Moore for remainder of his term, which ends in 2019; six charges against Moore include violation of Alabama's canon of ethics; suspension stems from Moore's order to state probate judges to refuse to issue marriage licenses same-sex couples.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
